SIMON  12   • Can we combine the hypothesis (hk)k=1,...,2K−1 in a more clever way than just returning the majority vote? Is the experience found in the boosting literature (Schapire and Freund, 2012) helpful for this purpose?  • How does LK compare experimentally to consistent algorithms?
